de.unlixx.runpng.util

Class IdTextContainer<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.util.IdTextContainer<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The data type to keep.

    public class IdTextContainer<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    Container to keep a value together with a translatable id-text combination. This can be used e. g. for lists, combo boxes, etc.
